credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Organ
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
description: Vertical rectangle. Tripartite, the central part being higher than the lateral ones. The pipes are standing upon panels and have in front, in the central part a cherub with scrolls and festoons, in the lateral parts a crown above scrolls and festoons. Two crossed festoons are hanging into each part from teh upper edge. Above is a pediment over an entablature with a frieze, which is concave above the central part. The pediment is triangular with a shell inside. At the outside corners and on top of the pediment are starts supported by a foot. The wall is colored.
name: Drawing
